title: A Change of Heart Towards Jordan | Africa Brooke | Mikhaila Peterson Podcast | #120
description:
Here's a clip from @Mikhaila Peterson's most recent podcast, "Leaving the Cult of Wokeness" where I made a guest appearance alongside Africa Brooke.⁣

Watch the full episode here: https://youtu.be/qU7iXtHTVtI
⁣
We discuss wokeness, politics in connection to religion, in-group preference, accepting other perspectives as well as hearing Africa share her experience regarding her viral article: "Why I'm Leaving the Cult of Wokeness".⁣
